i18n.title: Conversion Tool
desc: You can use this tool to convert LF2 data into 'Extra Data Zip' that can be used by LF2W.
> For how to use the conversion tool, please look at the video below:
In the video, "Memento's LF2 pack 2026" by Memento was used for demonstration,
and you can find it in the ['Extra Datas'](/extra_datas).
But I'm unable to support AI scripts at present ğŸ¤¦.
Support for AI script functionality may be added in future updates,
and such AI scripts will likely need to be written in TypeScript/JavaScript instead of ActionScript.
